channel.title: Research Interests on Linda Nguyen Website
channel.description: Recent content in Research Interests on Linda Nguyen Website

item.title: Deception Detection
item.description: Over the last several years, I have been looking to understand how people detect deception. This work has encompased a variety of behavioral and neural methods to examine unconscious detection of deception.

item.title: Cyber Deception
item.description: Along with our collaborators in UT Dallasâ€™ Computer Science department, we have been exploring ways to better understand deception online and in the world of cyber security. In addition, we are looking at ways to utilize human-machine teaming to make better decisions about deception detection.
